00031 
00032 if (!isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) { die(); }

00048 <!--loan specific javascript functions-->
00049 <script type="text/javascript">
00050 function confirmProcess(intLoanID, strItemCode, strProcess)
00051 {
00052     if (strProcess == 'return') {
00053         var confirmBox = confirm('<?php echo __('Are you sure you want to return the item'); ?> ' + strItemCode);
00054     } else {
00055         var confirmBox = confirm('<?php echo __('Are you sure to extend loan for'); ?> ' + strItemCode); //mfc
00056     }
00057 
00058     if (confirmBox) {
00059         // fill the hidden form value
00060         document.loanHiddenForm.process.value = strProcess;
00061         document.loanHiddenForm.loanID.value = intLoanID;
00062         // submit hidden form
00063         document.loanHiddenForm.submit();
00064     }
00065 }
00066 </script>
00067 <!--loan specific javascript functions end-->
00068 <?php
00069 // check if there is member ID
00070 if (isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) {
00071     $memberID = trim($_SESSION['memberID']);
00072     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $memberID);
00073     $loan_list_query = $dbs->query("SELECT L.loan_id, b.title, i.item_code, L.loan_date, L.due_date, L.return_date, L.renewed FROM loan AS L
00074         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON L.item_code=i.item_code
00075         LEFT JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id
00076         LEFT JOIN member AS m ON L.member_id=m.member_id
00077         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00078         WHERE L.is_lent=1 AND L.is_return=0 AND L.member_id='$memberID'");
00079 
00080     // create table object
00081     $loan_list = new simbio_table();
00082     $loan_list->table_attr = 'align="center" width="100%" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0"';
00083     $loan_list->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00084     $loan_list->highlight_row = true;
00085     // table header
00086     $headers = array(__('Return'), __('Extend'), __('Item Code'), __('Title'), __('Loan Date'), __('Due Date'));
00087     $loan_list->setHeader($headers);
00088     // row number init
00089     $row = 1;
00090     while ($loan_list_data = $loan_list_query->fetch_assoc()) {
00091         // alternate the row color
00092         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00093 
00094         // return link
00095         $return_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$loan_list_data['loan_id'].', \''.$loan_list_data['item_code'].'\', \'return\')" title="'.__('Return this item').'" class="returnLink">&nbsp;</a>';
00096         // extend link
00097         // check if membership already expired
00098         if ($_SESSION['is_expire']) {
00099             $extend_link = '<span class="noExtendLink" title="'.__('No Extend').'">&nbsp;</span>';
00100         } else {
00101             // check if this loan just already renewed
00102             if ($loan_list_data['return_date'] == date('Y-m-d')) {
00103                 $extend_link = '<span class="noExtendLink" title="'.__('No Extend').'">&nbsp;</span>';
00104             } else if (in_array($loan_list_data['loan_id'], $_SESSION['reborrowed'])) {
00105                 $extend_link = '<span class="noExtendLink" title="'.__('No Extend').'">&nbsp;</span>';
00106             } else {
00107                 $extend_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$loan_list_data['loan_id'].', \''.$loan_list_data['item_code'].'\', \'extend\')" title="'.__('Extend loan for this item').'" class="extendLink">&nbsp;</a>';
00108             }
00109         }
00110         // renewed flag
00111         if ($loan_list_data['renewed'] > 0) {
00112             $loan_list_data['title'] = $loan_list_data['title'].' - <strong style="color: blue;">'.__('Extended').'</strong>';
00113         }
00114         // check for overdue
00115         $curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00116         $overdue = $circulation->countOverdueValue($loan_list_data['loan_id'], $curr_date);
00117         if ($overdue) {
00118             $loan_list_data['title'] .= '<div style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">'.__('OVERDUED for').' '.$overdue['days'].' '.__('days(s) with fines value').' '.$overdue['value'].'</div>'; //mfc
00119         }
00120         // row colums array
00121         $fields = array(
00122             $return_link,
00123             $extend_link,
00124             $loan_list_data['item_code'],
00125             $loan_list_data['title'],
00126             $loan_list_data['loan_date'],
00127             $loan_list_data['due_date']
00128             );
00129 
00130         // append data to table row
00131         $loan_list->appendTableRow($fields);
00132         // set the HTML attributes
00133         $loan_list->setCellAttr($row, null, "valign='top' class='$row_class'");
00134         $loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 0, "valign='top' align='center' class='$row_class' style='width: 5%;'");
00135         $loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 1, "valign='top' align='center' class='$row_class' style='width: 5%;'");
00136         $loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 2, "valign='top' class='$row_class' style='width: 10%;'");
00137         $loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 3, "valign='top' class='$row_class' style='width: 55%;'");
00138 
00139         $row++;
00140     }
00141 
00142     // show reservation alert if any
00143     if (isset($_GET['reserveAlert']) AND !empty($_GET['reserveAlert'])) {
00144         $reservedItem = trim($_GET['reserveAlert']);
00145         // get reservation data
00146         $reserve_q = $dbs->query('SELECT r.member_id, m.member_name
00147             FROM reserve AS r
00148             LEFT JOIN member AS m ON r.member_id=m.member_id
00149             WHERE item_code=\''.$reservedItem.'\' ORDER BY reserve_date DESC');
00150         $reserve_d = $reserve_q->fetch_row();
00151         $member = $reserve_d[1].' ('.$reserve_d[0].')';
00152         $reserve_msg = str_replace(array('{itemCode}', '{member}'), array('<b>'.$reservedItem.'</b>', '<b>'.$member.'</b>'), __('Item {itemCode} is being reserved by member {member}')); //mfc
00153         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$reserve_msg.'</div>';
00154     }
00155     echo $loan_list->printTable();
00156     // hidden form for return and extend process
00157     echo '<form name="loanHiddenForm" method="post" action="circulation_action.php"><input type="hidden" name="process" value="return" /><input type="hidden" name="loanID" value="" /></form>';
00158 }
00159 
00160 // get the buffered content
00161 $content = ob_get_clean();
00162 // include the page template
00163 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
00164 ?>
